author: eth2_gitter_bot
content: <mratsim> I’ve started the https://github.com/eth2-clients organization we’ve discussed with a couple of teams in devcon

author: eth2_gitter_bot
content: <mratsim> the ideas is that things that would be easier to update collaboratively like the “multinet” start scripts or the “chat app” to test our respective libp2p implementations go there

author: eth2_gitter_bot
content: <mratsim> everyone is admin, please invite your team members as well so that they can do PR. We will transfer the multinet scripts from our nim-beacon-chain repo to that org ASAP.

author: eth2_gitter_bot
content: <mratsim> Name of the organization can be changed to something more inspiring if you have ideas ;)

author: eth2_gitter_bot
content: <mratsim> Hagibis would be a testnet name before we take over the world by a storm ;)

author: eth2_gitter_bot
content: <mratsim> I’m going to enjoy japan for the reminder of the week now :)

author: protolambda
content: Using "Muskoka" for a test service that's in the works. Got delayed a bit by devcon and new attestation aggregation ideas, but getting there

author: eth2_gitter_bot
content: <mratsim> I suppose that org can be where all clients put their xcli scripts for fuzzing as well

author: protolambda
content: Remainder for Muskoka is to fix test results pagination, and write dockerfiles for each of the client worker nodes (multi stage, wrapping the client cli with some instrumentation)

author: eth2_gitter_bot
content: <Daft-Wullie> is there a eth 2.0 implementers call planned for tomorrow?or postponed due to post-devcon decompression period?

author: eth2_gitter_bot
content: <Daft-Wullie> or for the day after tomorrow rather
